Function reference

All functions

Methods for listing_df objects
as_listing() as_keycol() is_keycol() get_keycols() listing_dispcols() add_listing_dispcol() `listing_dispcols<-`() add_listing_col()
Create a listing from a data.frame or tibble
make_row_df(<listing_df>)
Make pagination data frame for a listing
matrix_form(<listing_df>)
Transform rtable to a list of matrices which can be used for outputting
paginate_listing()
Paginate listings
split_into_pages_by_var()

rlistings is a part of the NEST and pharmaverse.
